page.title: 18Holiday Patterns in Warsop.
page.content: Most children in our school go on holiday in Britain.A few go abroad, Spain and France being the most popular countries to visit. Many local children visit the Lincolnshire coastal resorts,Skegness in particular.The N.W.of England, especially Blackpool,is popular as are places on the Yorkshire coast.Resorts in Devon and Cornwall are visited but to a lesser extent. Family seaside holidays are the most usual but quite a number of children have countryside holidays. Caravans are the most popular type of accommodation,though hotels and guest houses are often used.A smaller number of families choose tenting holidays or they stay in purpose_built camps such as Butlin's,where entertainment is provided.
